author: emiglior
body:
#### PR description:

Modifications of the Tracking POG recipe for producing TrackerRecoMaterial file for a recent (2026D41) phase2 geometry
https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/TrackingPOGRecoMaterialFromGeometry

#### PR validation:

Tests described in the TrackingPOGRecoMaterialFromGeometry  twiki 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR: No

@mtosi, @pwittich, @makortel, @ghugo83 @JanFSchulte This is of interest for you
title: Tracker reco material tool for phase2 in CMSSW_11_0_X
